host: Enter your server ip or url.
port: Enter your server port. If your server is not an Aternos server, maybe the default is 25565
username: Enter the AFKBot's username you want. (Whatever doesn't matter)
logger: true : displays not necessary logs (ex: key input logs).
DO_NOT_EDIT_CONFIGS_DOWN_BELOW: IF YOU DON'T KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING
